import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Transaction Status by payment_id"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/payment/status"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve status info of a payment by payment_id.
If cascading context is enabled, returns status of most recent payment in cascade.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["merchant_key","payment_id","hash"],"properties":{"merchant_key":{"type":"string","description":"Key for Merchant identification","example":"xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx"},"payment_id":{"type":"string","description":"Payment ID (public)","maxLength":255,"example":"dc66cdd8-d702-11ea-9a2f-0242c0a87002"},"hash":{"type":"string","description":"Special signature to validate your request to Payment Platform. Must be SHA1 of MD5 encoded string (uppercased): payment_id + merchant_pass\n","example":"E6F1FBC89B5A214C05D1EF34C3A8DB4D0F8A1E1C"}},"title":"StatusRequest"},"example":{"merchant_key":"xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx","payment_id":"63c781cc-de3d-11eb-a1f1-0242ac130006","hash":"E6F1FBC89B5A214C05D1EF34C3A8DB4D0F8A1E1C"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  label={undefined}

Please contact the site support"},"recurring_token":{"type":"string","description":"Recurring token (if recurring initialized)","example":"e5f60b35485e"},"shedule_id":{"type":"string","description":"Schedule ID for recurring payments (purchase operation only)","example":"57fddecf-17b9-4d38-9320-a670f0c29ec0"},"digital_wallet":{"type":"string","description":"Wallet provider, if digital wallets used for card payment ID","example":"order-1234"},"amount":{"type":"string","pattern":"^[0-9]+(\\.[0-9]{1,2})?$","description":"Product price","example":"0.19"},"currency":{"type":"string","maxLength":3,"description":"Currency code","example":"USD"},"description":{"type":"string","maxLength":1024,"description":"Product name","example":"Very important gift"}}},"customer":{"type":"object","required":["name","email"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"Customer's name","example":"John Doe"},"email":{"type":"string","format":"email","description":"Customer's email address","example":"example@mail.com"}}}},"title":"StatusResponse"},"examples":{"settled":{"summary":"Status Settled 10:07:47","status":"decline","reason":"Declined by processing","digital_wallet":"googlepay","order":{"number":"order-1234","amount":"0.19","currency":"USD","description":"Important gift"},"customer":{"name":"John Doe","email":"test@mail.com"}}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - missing or invalid parameters","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error","message"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string","description":"Error code","example":"invalid_request"},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable error message","example":"Missing required parameter 'payment_id'."}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - invalid merchant key or hash","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error","message"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string","description":"Error code","example":"invalid_request"},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable error message","example":"Missing required parameter 'payment_id'."}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
